title: Betfair23
author: Betfair23
content: Hello! I come to offer the PayPal verification service for 5 years (2028), I also have VCC of 3 years (2016)Data you receive:Card number.Due date.Security code.PPCode (if necessary).(Assistance is also given in case you don't know).More information:Verification for 5 years. VCCs are for single use (after confirmation they are discarded). After providing the data, it must be used immediately since the vcc is discarded to continue providing the service to other clients. Guarantee x 24 hours after having verified in case it asks you for any new action. The VCCs are created by the bank directly, nothing from bins or stolen #s. They serve anywhere in the world. VCCs are VISAPrice for 5 years: 6$Price for 3 years: 4$
